name: Domino Simulator (pommicket)
description: You can play a web version of this game (that does not include saving) at https://pommicket.github.io/DominoSimulator.html.A game where you place dominoes, then knock them over. Click to place a domino. Use the arrow keys to move, and WASD to rotate the camera, and press R and T to rotate the domino. When you're done, you can save it by clicking on one of the buttons on the left side of the screen, then, when you're ready, press enter. Now you can click to shoot a cube at the dominoes. Press Escape to quit.
